checks: Check duplicate samples
title: Duplicated samples.
message: Your samples file has duplicated entries, this is not allowed, please correct.
Description: Check duplicate samples

checks: Check that genes are not converted to dates in Excel
Description: Check that genes are not converted to dates in Excel

checks: Check zero rows/columns
Description: Check zero rows/columns

checks: Check that samples match counts
Description: Check that samples match counts

checks: Check that samples match comparisons
Description: Check that samples match comparisons

checks: Check duplicated sample names in counts.csv
title: Duplicated sample names in counts.csv.
message: Your count or expression matrix has duplicated sample names in the columns, please correct.
Description: Check duplicated sample names in counts.csv

checks: Check duplicate feature names in counts.csv
title: Duplicated feature names in counts.csv.
message: Your count or expression matrix has duplicated feature names, they will be merged.
Description: Check duplicate feature names in counts.csv

checks: Check columns that are not in the samples file
Description: Check columns that are not in the samples file

checks: Check zero rows
title: Rows with only zero values.
message: Your count or expression matrix has rows with all zeros. These will be removed.
Description: Check zero rows and remove them

checks: Check zero columns
title: Columns with only zero values.
message: Your count or expression matrix has columns with all zeros. These will be removed.
Description: Check zero columns and remove them

checks: Check duplicate rows
title: Duplicated rows in comparisons.
message: Your comparisons file has duplicated rows. This is now allowed, please correct.

checks: Check if it's a long or short comparison
Description: Check if it's a long or short comparison

checks: Check that long comparison matches samples
Description: Check that long comparison matches samples

checks: Check that short comparison validity
Description: Check that short format column name of comparison matches the cell -1 and 1 values

checks: Check that the end output files does not have 0 columns or zero rows
title: Empty matrix.
message: Your matrix is empty, with zero rows and zero columns.
Description: Check that the end output files have >1 row and >1 column in each case.

checks: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(counts)
title: Some sample names do not match count names
message: One or more samples names are not matching the column name of the counts file. We will correct the samples files based on columns of counts.
Description: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(genes)

checks: Check that rownames(samples) match long comparison rownames.
title: Inconsistent sample names and comparison names.
message: Your input files have samples names not matching the names in comparisons or counts.
Description: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(genes)

checks: Check that counts have the same order as samples.
title: Order of samples in comparison file does not match sample file.
message: We will re-order your comparison columns.
Description: Check that counts have the same order as samples.

checks: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(counts) partially
title: Some sample names not matching count names
message: Some of your samples names are matching the column names in the counts file.
Description: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(genes)

checks: Check that rows names of comparisons match rownames of samples.
title: Inconsistent sample and comparison names.
message: Your input files have comparison names not matching the sample namenames in comparisons.
Description: Check that rows names of comparisons match rownames of samples.

checks: Check that colnames(counts) match rownames(samples)
title: Some column names of counts do not match sample names
message: One or more counts column names are not matching the sample names. We will correct the counts files based on rows of counts.
Description: Check that column names(counts) match rownames(samples)

checks: Some comparison names do not match groups.
title: Some comparison names do not match column values (groups).
message: Some comparisons were removed, as the column names did not match the column values.
Description: Make sure the names before and after _vs_ match the column, or use the online comparison builder.

checks: None of the comparison names match the groups.
title: No comparison names matched column groups.
message: All comparisons were removed, as the column names (_vs_) did not match the column values.
Description: Make sure the names before and after _vs_ match the column, or use the online comparison builder.

checks: No "_vs_" detected
title: No "_vs_" detected
message: Please review your comparison file or use the online comparison maker.
Description: Make sure column names of contrasts are in a valid format.

checks: No match between samples and counts.
title: No match between samples and counts.
message: There was no match between your rownames of samples and column names of counts. Please check your input files.
Description: Please check your samples and counts files.

checks: No columns in comparison.
title: No columns identified in comparisons.
message: Please add columns in comparisons with column name _vs_, or use our online comparison builder.
Description: No columns in contrast.
